about_the_game:
Embark on an unforgettable journey in Wildsite, an alien world teeming with life and adventure.

KEY FEATURES

  • PLASMA GUNS? Of course! Sometimes, the only way to deal with a problem is to pew pew pew it until it stops moving.
  • TAMING It's not your typical "befriend the wild animals" scenario. More like "capture a baby animal, levitate it, and "gently" persuade it to be your loyal companion."
  • COMPANION Crash-landed on an uncharted planet with one very disgruntled AI companion named Bob.
  • BUILD AND PERSONALIZE YOUR OWN HOME: Design your dream home in any style you like, from cozy cabins to sprawling mansions.
  • TAKE YOUR HOUSE WITH YOU: Shrink your home to a manageable size using your laser and carry it with you wherever you go.
  • RESOURCE GATHERING WITH LASERS: Utilize your Multi-Tool's versatile lasers to gather resources from the environment with precision and efficiency.
  • EMBARK ON QUESTS: Embark on a series of captivating quests that will take you across the vast expanse of Wildsite.
  • EXPLORE AN EXPANSIVE HANDCRAFTED WORLD: Discover hidden secrets, unearth ancient ruins, and unravel Wildsite's mysteries.
  • WEATHER SURVIVAL: Brave the dynamic and ever-changing weather conditions of Wildsite, from scorching heat to torrential downpours, to ensure your survival.

BOB THE AI COMPANION

Speaking of Bob, he's basically a sarcastic love child of Bender, Roger, and Rick, constantly reminding you of your piloting "skills" and questioning your every move. Think of him as your personal (and slightly judgmental) survival coach.

BUILD YOURSELF A HOME

Construct a sturdy base to call your own, providing shelter from the elements and a place to store your belongings. Design your home however you see fit.
Take your home with you wherever you go, transforming any location into a personalized haven.

EXPLORE A VAST OPEN WORLD

Venture into the heart of this alien wilderness, where diverse biomes await your discovery. From lush forests teeming with life to beautiful beaches harboring hidden secrets, each corner of Wildsite holds its unique challenges and rewards.
As you explore, you'll discover hidden caves, ancient ruins, and forgotten settlements, each filled with its own unique story to tell.

CRAFT ESSENTIAL TOOLS AND WEAPONS

Harness the resources to craft tools and weapons that will be your lifeline in this unforgiving environment. Mine precious metals, gather wood and stone, and utilize your ingenuity to craft everything from makeshift tools to sophisticated weapons. With each crafted item, you strengthen your ability to survive and thrive in the wilderness.

HUNT FOR SUSTENANCE AND GATHER RESOURCES

Venture into the wilderness to hunt for food and gather resources that will keep you alive. Face the dangers of the fauna, from ferocious predators to cunning creatures. Cook your kills over a campfire to satisfy your hunger and keep your body fueled. Utilize your survival skills to gather the resources you need to build your base, craft tools, and maintain your health.

ADAPT TO THE EVER-CHANGING WEATHER

Prepare for the dynamic and unpredictable weather of Wildsite. Brace yourself for scorching heat, poison rain, and howling winds. Adapt your strategies and prepare for the harsh conditions, whether you're exploring the depths of a lush forest or staying home.

CO-OP

We are building Wildsite with co-op in mind even from the start.


No two playthroughs will be the same, as the world of Wildsite is constantly evolving, with new challenges and rewards waiting to be discovered.
So pack your essentials, grab your multi-tool, and embark on an unforgettable adventure in Wildsite!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / AMD R9 280X
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD RX Vega 56

short_description: An open-world survival craft game with laser guns for 1-4 players. Crash-landed on an uncharted planet brimming with plasma, you must survive and craft your way out of this place. There will be plasma guns and futuristic weapons too.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
